title: Mandala Design Wooden Wall Clock ? 12x16 Inch Digital Print Hanging Decor (Without Battery)
description:
Elevate your home d?cor with this stunning Digital Printed Wooden Wall Clock, where artistry meets functionality. Measuring 12x16 inches, this rectangular timepiece showcases a captivating golden mandala pattern set against a deep purple background, creating a luxurious and serene visual appeal.

Crafted from premium wood, the clock features gold-colored numerals and hands that complement the intricate design while ensuring clear readability. Its battery-free operation offers hassle-free maintenance, and the hook-mounted setup allows for quick and secure wall installation.

Ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, meditation spaces, or offices, this clock adds a spiritual and sophisticated touch to any interior. Whether you're drawn to mandala symbolism or simply love elegant design, this piece is a timeless addition to your wall.
